info.title: GitHub Issues API
info.description: API for retrieving issues, branches, and pull requests from a GitHub repository.

get.summary: Get a list of open issues
get.description: Retrieves the first page of open issues from the GitHub repository.

200.description: A string containing the list of open issues in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieves a specific issue from a github repository.

200.description: A string containing the issue in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieves the first page of branches from the GitHub repository.

200.description: A string containing the list of branches in JSON format.

get.summary: Get a list of open pull requests
get.description: Retrieves the first page of open pull requests from the GitHub repository.

200.description: A string containing the list of open pull requests in JSON format.

post.summary: Create a pull request to main with a new branch.
post.description: Creates a new feature branch, commits the code script to run.py, and creates a pull request to the main branch.

requestBody.description: A string containing the new code content for a python script.

200.description: A string info about the new pull-request created.

get.description: Retrieves a specific pull request from the GitHub repository.

parameters.name: pullRequestNumber
parameters.description: The pull request number to retrieve.

200.description: A string containing the pull request in JSON format.
